description: The poncho is an undervalued rain garment with excellent ventilation that’s also very easy to move about in. Lappland Eco-Shell Poncho has a number of smart features that make it easy to remain focused in heavy rain. A prize-winning garment that was designed for hunters but is just as useful for bird watchers, nature photographers or anyone else who wants to get close to wildlife.
name: Fjallraven Lappland Eco-Shell Poncho
